original_text: That is how they marched round the city on the second day. They marched round once and then they returned to their tents. They did the same thing for six days.
korean_text: 그 둘째 날에도 그 성을 한 번 돌고 진영으로 돌아오니라 엿새 동안을 이같이 행하니라

sentences.original_text: That is how they marched round the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그렇게 성을 한 바퀴 돌았다

sentences.original_text: and then they returned to their tents
